Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServiceChangeReceiver<T>
    "Listener" interface that must be implemented by an actor that wants to use a JAServiceTracker to keep track of services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activator
    Activator for the jactor2-osgi bundle, that provides all the pre-defined durable factories.
    FactoriesImporter
    Imports an OsgiFactoryLocator from another bundle into the factory locator of the current bundle.
    FactoryLocatorActivator
    An activator that provides both a mailbox factory and a registered factory locator service.
    JAContextActivator
    A basic activator with a JAContext, with a reference to the BundleContext stored in the bundleContext property in the JAContext.
    JAServiceTracker<T>
    Tracks OSGi services, reacting to OSGi's Service events, and publishes all the matching services using thread-safe actor requests.
    LocateService<T>
    Locates (or waits for) a service.
    Osgi
    A collection of static methods for integration with OSGi.
    OsgiFactoryLocator
    A factory locator that works with OSGi.
    ServiceChange<T>
    Unbound request used to pass the changed list of services to the listener.
